segments.text: I'm peeking into this kitchen, and everything seems normal at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is on, filling the basin steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize it's overflowing onto the counter!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring down the front like a curtain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the growing puddle and hasn't reacted at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning around, I spot the boy on a stool by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's tiptoeing to snag cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is leaning back dangerously far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, hand up, ready to catch one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this cookie heist so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a peaceful garden, totally contrasting the indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticed the water or the wobble yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
